title: 820-00928 Power button not working
message: This board was pretty clean. After replacing a few components around UA900, it's booting normally but the power button is not working. Nothing happens when I hold it down. I tried another button. No change. Any ideas where to look for something like this? Everything around the power button is clean.

title: 820-00928 Power button not working
message: SMC_ONOFF_L is open at the power button (R4911) but measures fine at R5170. A break somewhere in the line apparently.

title: 820-00928 Power button not working
message: Ok, just a blown trace. R5179 and R5256 are fine, but SW5200 is not connected to the line. Some damaged occurred at TPAC517 which seems to be the source of the problem. Need to figure out how to repair this line now.

title: 820-00928 Power button not working
message: Ran a wire halfway across the board. Working fine now.
